Method Detail

assignClass

static ValidationClassificationResult assignClass(int[] wordList,
                                                  TreeFactory f,
                                                  java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,HierarchyTree> nodeMap)
for a array of subclasses, gets the probabilities of each subclass, returns the classification whose subclass has the highest probability. formula: prob = sum( log(p (wi|c) ) ) i = 1 to n for n words denominator = log ( sum( exp (prob)j ) ) for j = 1 to m for m classes final log posterior prob = prob + p(c) - denominator

calculateProb

private static float calculateProb(TreeFactory factory,
                                   HierarchyTree tree,
                                   int[] testWordList)
Calculates the log probability for the tree node
